DataElement.preferredName: Exposure as Collected Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Radiation Therapy Begin Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The start date of radiation therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Exposure as Collected Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Radiation Therapy Begin
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the exposure as collected domain.:Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
